text: Ara muminadera duâ€™dala dbandbe lipta hale tomara tadera madhye mimansa kare da'o. Atahpara tadera ekadala an'ya dalera birud'dhe barabari karale, yara barabari kare tadera birud'dhe tomara yud'dha kara, yataksana na tara allahara nirdesera dike phire ase. Tarapara yadi tara phire ase, tabe tadera madhye inasaphera sathe aposa-mimansa kare da'o ebam n'yayabicara kara. Niscaya allaha n'yayabicarakaderake bhalabasena
